website_summaries.verdict: This tall model’s lightning-quick brewing time and many programmable options makes the premium Keurig’s K-Duo Plus their most adaptable coffee maker to date.
pros: Uses ground coffee or K-Cup pods
cons: A coffee maker this good was destined to have a high price tag

customer_reviews.title: Best Keurig we’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so new there’s no instructions yet, but once you figure out how to use it, it is the best keurig coffee maker I’ve owned. You can make one cup using purchased kcups or the my kcup re-usable adapter using your favorite grounds or brew a 6,8,10,12 cup carafe using your favorite grounds. It does more but takes up less room than my old keurig. It also looks great and is well made. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: W. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: There is a design flaw somewhere in this coffee maker. I'm on my second duo+ in four weeks. Both units have the same problem. After about 10 days of use, it stops brewing. The water will not flow out of the reservoir through the unit. It makes boiling sounds then shuts off within 10 seconds of starting the brew. It looks great in our kitchen, and I love the reservoir idea. Disappointed that this doesn't work (twice)
customer_reviews.author: MissScarlet

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, tastes good!
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday. I had a bunn and a generic Keurig wannabe that died. It came with quick start instructions, but in the quick start instructions it referred to the user guide online. This coffee maker is so new there isn't one. I got on the chat online and the customer service lady talked me through it, got me registered, and will send me a pdf file when they become available. It is so nice not having 2 bulky pots on the counter, and the coffee doesn't taste bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile with compact footprint
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice machine. Has a fairly small footprint and is very versatile to meet the needs of different individuals and different days. The coffee comes out hot and tasty. The thermal carafe keeps it hot a lot longer than it lasts around our house. Different cup sizes and the strong button provides limitless ability to control the strength. The moveable reservoir provides flexibility to fit in your space. I MacGyver'd the lid with a float valve so filling the reservoir is automatic for the added convenience. If you want full pots on some days and individual cups on others, you should give this model a look.
customer_reviews.author: Xaa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Keurig, needs bigger reservoir
customer_reviews.text: I love how compact this is. It takes up so much less space than my previous Keurig. The pot keeps coffee hot literally all day. I can make appt at 9am and at 8pm it's still drinkable hot. My only complaint, and reason for 4 stars instead of 5, is the reservoir. They boast the ability to make a 12cup (96oz) pot. But it only has a 60oz reservoir. I thought maybe the internal team would make up the difference but no. If you want a full pot, you have to refill the reservoir halfway thru. If it gets too low it will stop brewing and you'll be left with only an 8cup pot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cram

customer_reviews.title: *ROCKSTAR* Coffee Machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee machine is a *ROCKSTAR*!!! I'm so happy that it has only one place to add water and one unified control-panel, which serves both the capsule and drip-basket brewing functions. I really appreciate the relocatable water-tank, also. The machine looks great, on my counter, and Keurig has truly made the best combo-machine out there!
customer_reviews.author: Putnam Wright

customer_reviews.title: single serve should include  little K cup strainer & say you can brew a single serve ground coffee.
customer_reviews.text: No where could I find how to brew 1 single serve ground coffee. Finally figured out you can buy & use replaceable K cup filter just fill, close lid, drop into K Cup Pod side of machine. Unfortunately my machine has stopped brewing Carafe size coffee , grounds basket fills with water & over flows out the sides of basket onto counter. Plus coffee tastes burnt. Purchased Nov 2019. Bad Customer Service. feel like you being grilled.. Credit my money back or let me get choose a different machine.
customer_reviews.author: S.L

customer_reviews.title: Failed.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the new duo for it's counter space size and all in one design. I had high hopes for this one but, it wasn't meant to be. Item slowly quit working within three weeks, the k-cup quit altogether and the coffee brewer took three tries before it would make a full carafe. They'll get the bugs worked out but in the meantime I'll be using something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: metal filter clogs
customer_reviews.text: In making a pot of coffee, do NOT use finely ground coffee. Two out of three pots we made clogged, and we had coffee overflowing all over the counter and floor. Have not tried paper filters yet, but a coffee maker should be able to handle all kinds of ground coffee. The pod system works fine, and it's nice to have more cup size and strength options. Also, the reservoir is much easier to use than previous models. That curved reservoir, which was clearly designed for looks and not function, was always very lame and good riddance to it.
customer_reviews.author: edc1954

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made & seller won't issue refund
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift from my mother. She is a stickler when it comes to her coffee. She didn't like the pot and said it was cheaply made. I requested a refund from the seller and just a heads up- he has asked me to call Keurig customer service. Just be aware returns aren't easy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sedgwick

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for single cups or a full pot
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on the convenience and speed of Keurig single pods, but there are times when you know you'll be drinking a pot, and this machine is a genius at both. Plus, the metal pot/carafe is extremely well insulated, and it keeps the coffee warm for a long time without having to keep the pot on a burner, as you have to do with uninsulated glass carafes. Another plus: the water reservoir is easy to remove from the machine to fill, and easy to clean, unlike my previous Keurig. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jake from DC

customer_reviews.title: keruig-coffee duo recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love a few things about this coffee maker, 1. Slim design and adjustable water reservoir. 2. Flavor of coffee 3. Can make single cup or pot Not great 1. Carafe coffee didn't seem to stay hot long enough 2. Keep opening on top kind of inconvenient Overall I would recommend it, ive been saving my prime points and got it with them. I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: gina spaz

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker! I’ve purchased quite few coffee makers over the years (traditional auto drip, multi-function, French press, k-cup, cappuccino maker - I’ve owned them all) but had never found the perfect machine until now. It’s easy to clean, easy to fill, coffee stays hot for hours without the annoying burnt coffee smell that you sometimes get with a hot plate, and both the coffee in the carafe and single cups taste great!!!
customer_reviews.author: caford

customer_reviews.title: Not A Quality Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: This Version is Awful! I would NOT recommend purchasing! All we’ve ever owned has been Keurig products and all of them have had issues. The machine will shut off mid-brew, not make the correct amount of coffee, takes 15min+ sometimes to brew!
customer_reviews.author: Brady Prall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! Tried both drip coffee and iPod. The coffee wasn’t hot either way. Better off with K cup. Didn’t tell you when drip coffee was done had to keep looking at the pot to see how long it would take. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Richinren

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this machine!
customer_reviews.text: Update July 2020 - Keurig did finally send a replacement machine. After 3 months that machine stopped working as well. Inferior product. Machine stopped working after about three months. Tried all the troubleshooting. Called Keurig support. Did not offer any assistance. They won't send a new machine until I return this one to them. It's a multiple step process to get them to accept the return. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: emazing

customer_reviews.title: The best and only coffee you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this machine is its duo use for both k-cups and ground coffee. It also have a 3 button process to make any coffee. You just turn the coffee machine on. Select either carafe or k-cup. Whether you would like it strong or not by a push of a button. Select the cup oz. size if its a k-cup or how many cups in carafe mode, and then brew. It also have a indicator when to add water if the water again. Best investment ever.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanenyc

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to use. Wasn’t to bulky. Coffee was hot for about 45mins, at the most. Flavor of coffee was mediocre. You have to put more water in reservoir than you actually need, even when doing k-cup, or you’ll get a message to add more water. Until you do it won’t brew. For the cost I wasn’t satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: pattycakes

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my espresso machine, I really just want my latte and it does not disappoint with bold grounds, my own and K-pods. The bonus is the convenience of space, maintenance and use without compromising flavor. The only thing is when I opened the box an odd smell emanated from cardboards but the product was perfectly new without smell or issues but I had to get rid of box ASAP. Most importantly the machine is magnificent. Now I am just waiting for the Miroco milk frother then I’ll be living my best life!
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Gillies

customer_reviews.title: Save time filling with water
customer_reviews.text: We like the time and annoyance saved by not having to fill the pot every time. Also we like the ability to move the water supply tank to either side or to the back. We use the unit for making single cups and carafes interchangeably. It took a little time to get used to and Keurig could have inserted some suggestions in its operating manual, such as making sure the carafe door is completely closed and that the top of the pot is fully twisted in. We have been using refillable "K-cups" for our cups and the coffee cup gets a little "chewy" near the bottom. Overall we are very pleased with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: john m everett

customer_reviews.title: keeps shutting down
customer_reviews.text: the unit looks good, however, multiple times the unit will make a half cup of coffee and then shut down. then I need to unplug it for a few seconds to reset it. wasting K cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good combo coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy to use, water filling is very easy Dislikes: - Carafe doesn't hold temperature very long, compared to my previous Cuisinart - No alarm or beep when a pot is finished brewing
customer_reviews.author: John E. Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: HOME RUN
customer_reviews.text: This Keurig Coffee maker is the best I have ever owned. The coffee takes just a bit longer to make but it is worth it. I really like the K-Duo plus feature for later in the day when you don't have the time to make a full pot of coffee. The K-Cup is easy to use and very handy. The coffee maker fits in a small space and I like that also.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Kuerig user for many years. Love this brewer. I mostly use single cup, and it does take a little longer due to the machine shutting down after idle for 5 minutes, which I find is a great safety feature. For company, I use the pot, keeps coffee hot for at least 3 hours, and still tastes fresh. Very nice looking machine, and does not take up a lot of room on your counter. Highly recommend for any coffee lover.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Jennex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: After researching and thinking about it for several months, I decided to try this Keurig Duo. I couldn't be more pleased with it. It replaces an older classic Keurig machine and a much older Mr Coffee machine which was brought out of storage when working from home became the "new normal" due to the pandemic. I am very happy with the space saving design, ease of use for both single K cups and carafes. Easy to fill water pitcher, easy to clean. And the carafe does keep the coffee warm for hours. This is an excellent choice for the multi use machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kfathman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! No fuss!
customer_reviews.text: This Keurig answered most of our needs for a coffee pot. We like the clean convenient Kcup option but drink enough coffee in the morning to make a pot! The machine is easy to clean and has a great aesthetic! The side (reverse to back) reservoir is THE BEST! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee machine well worth spending the extra money for flavor and the carafe keeps coffee hot for over 3 hrs no hot plate burn and single k pod cups for fast cup of coffee and waking up to fresh brewed coffee with the timer would highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brown Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad not to need 2 coffeepots on my counter now! I was surprised that the pot didn't have a heater under it, but the thermos pot keeps coffee warm for a couple of hours, which is long enough. I brew my cappachino, then a pot, and I'm good for the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Mumm

customer_reviews.title: Best of Both
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of both the product & the coffee. I had a basic pod type Keurig unit for years but combining the economy of bulk coffee with the option of a single cup is very useful. The Carafe keeps everything HOT for hours. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Macman

customer_reviews.title: A good all in one coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it’s a good coffee maker. It’s nice to have the option of a carafe or a pod. I also like having a stainless steel carafe instead of a glass one provided with most coffee makers. The maker is also a little larger than I anticipated. The only reason I wouldn’t give it 5 stars is that making a carafe of coffee is pretty slow compared to other coffee makers I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. LOVE. BEST KEURIG! Where were you all of my life??
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. has the best of both worlds since you can brew with a pod, or a whole pot. Pot is easy to clean with an old trick I learned some time ago; just use a dishwasher pod and hot water and let it sit then rinse out. The only minor ding, is that I can't find the filter pods to brew ground coffee but I can live with the rest of the pros.
customer_reviews.author: yieldinGrace

customer_reviews.title: Love the options
customer_reviews.text: Love my Keurig sometimes a cup sometimes a pot love having the options and it doesn’t take up much room
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee brewer from single cup Kcup to 12 cup with real coffee grounds but pot hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of brew sizes - single cup to 12 cup pot. TWO MAJOR DISLIKES - 1) the 12 cup pot is very hard to clean. However, cannot empty 100% of rinse water due to poor design - the plastic top portion does not align with stainless steel body which means there is always some rinse water remaining in the bottom of the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker had everything I need. Brews a great pot of coffee that keeps hot for 6+ hours. It brews a single cup and has room for a travel mug. It's small size allows it to go anywhere. I'm so over the moon happy with this model and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Keurig Duo Plus coffee maker. It is easy to use and makes delicious coffee. I like the fact that I can make an extra single cup if I want to after the carafe is empty. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Goldielocks512

customer_reviews.title: The best of two worlds
customer_reviews.text: I love the duo option of this coffee maker. It makes excellent coffee by the carafe and single cup. It is easy to operate and easy to clean. I ordered reusable Keurig cups too because I do not like disposables. Best coffee maker I have had in years.
customer_reviews.author: slphas

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee pot I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best Kerrigan I owned. The flavor of individual cups as well as entire pot are great. It’s easy to use and has options I like such as the choice to make a strong cup. It is not bulky and looks sleek. I’m happy with everything about this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kleber

customer_reviews.title: Best 2 in 1!
customer_reviews.text: The Keurig K-Duo is awesome. It was very easy to set up and the flexibility to put the water container in 3 different positions is great. It brews great tasting coffee. The K-Duo is quiet and quick to brew. The carafe keeps the coffee warm for a long time and it's well designed (no spilling when pouring and the handle is comfortable). My only suggestion would be to offer a stand to put a mug on top of when brewing a single cup because there is a large height difference that causes a lot of splatter.
customer_reviews.author: awilson

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Maker I’ve Owned Yet
customer_reviews.text: Really like being able to do a whole pot or one cup. Being able to move the water to either side is a nice design. The carafe keeps coffee hot longer than glass, but the outside is cool to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: J Payne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this unit!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace my old broken Keurig and a Bunn coffee maker. Very impressed! The K-Cups are what they are, but making a full carafe of coffee has never been so easy and it tastes much better than my Bunn, which I could never make a good carafe with, even with the same brand coffee. The thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot long enough to grab a few cups of coffees, and the space savings has been very appreciated too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I was expecting it to be for the price. It is very plasticky and flimsy. I bought it because I wanted to maximize counter space and decided to try this 2 in 1 machine. I do like that I can brew individual cups or a full carafe, however it takes quite long to brew 1 single cup compared to a Nespresso. Also, I wish it brewed 4 cups in carafe but 6 is the minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the combo
customer_reviews.text: We use this at home. It's so easy to make different things - coffee, tea or hot chocolate - so quickly. When we want a whole pot of coffee, it's there. So far we have only good experiences.
customer_reviews.author: bj las

customer_reviews.title: It's a Keurig...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this was too easy to set up, too convenient to fill and too easy to get brewing. The Water reservoir has a good supply and can fill a carafe and still allow 4 pods at 12oz to be made before a refill. It is very fast, very quiet and I have to admit it.... I like it more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin McHardy

customer_reviews.title: Everything all in one and more
customer_reviews.text: Love the feature that let's you position the water tank in 3 different positions. Love the programmable features too. Not overly bulky. All in all I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Arnesen

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: love the option to make a pot or k-cup. Controls are laid out very well, luminated for easy use. Don't have to pre-measure water, just select the amount.
customer_reviews.author: wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: Good combo
customer_reviews.text: It’s a few more buttons to get to coffee but it is a great blend of k cup and brewed coffee. I would recommend this to others and have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Schneider

customer_reviews.title: BEST OF BOTH, 1 or 12 CUPS COFFEE
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I have the ability to make one cup or 12 cups! The size of the unit is also excellent and doesn’t take up much room on our counter.
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: The best choice
customer_reviews.text: I debated between this and the similar Cuisinart model, and I’m so glad I went with the Keurig. Setup was super easy and it’s so easy to use and keep clean for everyday use. This is our first keurig so we’re loving trying all the different flavor k cups, and we use both k cups and carafe. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This coffee maker!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffeemaker! The option of being able to move the reservoir is awesome! The coffee, from both pot & pod, tastes great. The carafe keeps coffee hot for at least 3 hours (that’s as long as we have tried). I would recommend this (& have) to anyone looking for a new coffee maker!!
customer_reviews.author: S&K McK

customer_reviews.title: Makes Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this coffee maker about 3 weeks. I absolutely love it. Easy to make a pot of coffee or just a cup as needed. Makes wonderful tasting coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk, worst design ever. If you want a real pot of coffee get a coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee maker from a good brand. Easy to use and makes a very rich cup of coffee !
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Pot brew is sketchy
customer_reviews.text: K cup works great. The pot brew randomly makes watered down pots of coffee, even on strong setting
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Whether you want one cup or need a full pot of coffee, this is the one for you
customer_reviews.author: djbrdh

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and great coffee too!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it was easy to set up and we made our first pot to great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for another brand we had. Love the slim profile on our counter and the ability to make a carafe or a single cup.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my household.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Keurig. Definitely worth the purchase for my family. Great for making that single travel cup in the morning while running out the door and having the carafe still jice and hot for others.
customer_reviews.author: MissMagnoliaSC

customer_reviews.title: I like having a choice but the brewing time is too long for a pot of coffee
customer_reviews.text: It takes longer to brew a pot of coffee than a regular coffee machine!
customer_reviews.author: anna king

customer_reviews.title: modern looking and convenient
customer_reviews.text: i love that i can make an individual cup or put on a whole pot when there is company over. it is also sleek and modern looking so it doesn't take up a bunch of counter space
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use as carafe and the pods! Delivers great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Loving this brewer
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. My husband is retired and uses the carafe. I use the cups and love that I can make it strong or not. Also I love that if I fill a cup and there is not enough I can easily add more without using another K- cup
customer_reviews.author: cheryl k.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Made Christmas easy with a houseful of guests.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can make a pot if more than one cup is needed while being able to use the K-cup for only one. Water heats fast. Able to remove and pause the pot while filling to enable pouring a cup and them replacing it to continue.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Willis

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Wow summarizes this machine. I’ve never owned a Keurig and always used a drip maker. Convenience is the biggest difference. I can now enjoy coffee super fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super easy to use and set up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Versatile unit - great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product so far. Having the versatility between carafe or k-cup is awesome! Taste of coffee is great regardless of brew type and filtration pod definitely improves quality (ordering extra water filters now).
customer_reviews.author: K. Ledermann

customer_reviews.title: That Amazon is quick to help
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can brew a pot of coffee or just a cup. As for getting a coffee maker that did not work, Amazon was quick to send me a new one and to help me out with knowing how I could send the one that did not work , back with no cost me. This coffee maker is awesome and Amazon was there for me
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mettler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. You never know when you will need 12cups or just one.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I like the convenience to make one cup or a full pot. It’s a little expensive as I have seen other products from competitors as less expensive alternatives but the quality and consistency is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker because you can do a single cup or do 12 cups with the insulated carafe it came with. The 12 cup carafe is great when you are having a party. The other carafe I had only made 4 cups so this upgrade is fanatastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker we have ever had. The whole thing just makes sense and is so easy to use. The water gets good and hot and it makes the coffee strong if you push that button. It also looks good on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: vblack

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Takes up less space then last one and pot of coffee is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eng

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over Keurig 2.0
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to make a pot or single cup. The unit is compact, takes less space than my old single cup Keurig. The unit is also very quiet. No more loud pumps. Also like the ability to put the tank on either side or behind.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K. Laufer

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Versatility of one cup up to 12 cups makes it handy for us.
customer_reviews.author: Darren W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a ninja coffee maker which did not make great coffee and took up a lot of space. This has been excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards

customer_reviews.title: One item replacing two on the counter saving counter space
customer_reviews.text: The product works okay, however, after just getting it set up I find that Costco has the same item $40 cheaper? I contacted customer service and they do not even try to price match or compete?
customer_reviews.author: Ron McKim

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Space saving machine that looks great on the counter. If warm the insulated thermos with hot water first, the coffee stays hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Workman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this coffee machine. I love it. Perfect size for the counter, I love it has two options: pot or single.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth the expense
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of steps but the end result coffee is delish
customer_reviews.author: Stedder

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use my own grounds and the coffee is perfect. I also like the coffee pot because the coffee is great and stays hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mizel

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the previous version.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this was to assemble. The water tank can moved to any side of the unit. This is my second Keurig with an insulated pot. This superior the first generation.
customer_reviews.author: laurie l humiston

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Forever looking for a Keurig that didn't take up my entire counter, made individual coffee's AND a carafe! and has a nice size reservoir DONE
customer_reviews.author: Retta-Lo

customer_reviews.title: 2-in-1
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Father’s Day gift for my husband! We love it! Great to have a single serve or if we want more than that it’s easily transitioned to a larger serving with just a push of a button
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Poleviyuma

customer_reviews.title: Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Love my new coffee pot. Easy to use slim, takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Schelich

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new one. The other same model lasted over 10 years. Hope the same with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love it on my counter!
customer_reviews.text: Space is valuable and convenience is even better. I love the old fashion grind coffee and my husband loves the "K" cups. Its so versatile!
customer_reviews.author: tyler moll

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee pot. I have saved so much money on K-Cups by using the carafe, yet I still have the option when I need a quick cup!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of my year!
customer_reviews.text: Uses little space on the counter compared to others and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McKee

customer_reviews.title: New Keurig
customer_reviews.text: Love the single cup or full pot options. Easy to clean and coffee taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver design  and options - just wish it was hotter
customer_reviews.text: Great space saver design and options - just wish the coffee was hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is great to use as single cup or brew a pot
customer_reviews.author: Mustapha Gharaee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use, clean, and the coffee is good! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: So easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size and so easy to fill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The K Cup feature doesn't offer the standard mug amount of coffee You can get a partial cup or over- flowing. The carafe feature isn't hot and makes a mess when you pour from it. Wish I could return my $225 dollar coffee maker!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This offers the best of both "coffee worlds!"
customer_reviews.text: We love our brewed coffee, and we love a thermos style carafe that keeps coffee hot far longer than glass. We love our k-cups when we want a quick brew and for flavor treats and hot tea or cocoa. This brewer allowed us to get rid to two machines. Another great feature is that the spot for the k-cups is on top and not slanted. The water reservoir can be placed on either side or in the back - a great option. I can find only "pros" about this product. It is streamlined, simple to operate and easy to clean. It is a bit pricey but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Primers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee, excellent design
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out that the numbers (6,8,10,12) on the top "dial" determine how big a single k-cup cup of coffee is delivered you can get a four sizes of cup from small to regular (large cup from previous Keurigs)., as well as four different quantities in the carafe. The coffee is hot, the water reservoir is bigger than the older model and the footprint smaller. Love the fact that you can make a single cup of carafe from the same machine. Also this machine is QUIET!!! Well done Keurig - best coffee maker yet and I have had them all, Mr Coffee, Bunn, Cuisinart......
customer_reviews.author: Carole A. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Finally - the brewer that gives me everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: After an exhaustive search and trying several coffee systems, I think I've finally found one that does everything I need. Thanks Keurig. Simple set up, clean look, easy to operate, full carafe up to 12 cups using my choice of ground coffee and standard K-Pods for single cups any time. Keeps coffee nice and hot for a long time and the carafe is simple to clean. The only thing I would have added would be a signal when the carafe is finished brewing but still 5-star all the way.
customer_reviews.author: LeonF

customer_reviews.title: Keurig could do a little better.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this takes a very small area of space on my counter. There are only two things that I do not like. First, moving the water reservoir to the other side was difficult to do. Instructions were horrible on this. Secondly, the coffee comes out slower than my old machine, and is not a steady stream. A lot of splashes on my counter that requires a quick wipe down with a cloth. Used to it not so no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ptagg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Serves us all!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too tall to sit on our Keurig drawer and still open the top for the kcups but beside that we love it! Took a little while to figure out the display but now it seems silly I didn't understand. Directions probably would've helped. It makes some noise though. About as loud as our old single cup that was 5 or 6 years old. That's my only complaint...and it's not worth not buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kay J. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with small footprint
customer_reviews.text: For us, this coffee maker is perfect in every way. It has a good selection of pot and cup sizes an you never have to measure water. Just fill the tank, press the right buttons and go. Makes an excellent pot as well as perfect single cup pods. Doesn’t seem to matter if the pods are Kuerig or not as long as they are the proper type. Will make a cup or pot of hot water with no additional steps. Footprint is very small. It uses a single tank for both, so the remaining question is, how long will it last. That will be the deciding issue. For now it is the right pot for us.
customer_reviews.author: ElaineJ

product_meta.title: Keurig K-Duo Plus Coffee Maker, Single Serve and 12-Cup Carafe Drip Coffee Brewer, Compatible with K-Cup Pods and Ground Coffee, Black
product_meta.description: Style:K-Duo PlusIntroducing the K-Duo Plus single serve and carafe Coffee maker: the perfect brewer for any occasion. This versatile brewer is the best of both worlds, using both K-Cup pods and ground Coffee to brew a cup and a carafe of your favorite varieties. The included 12-Cup thermal carafe is perfect for keeping your Coffee warm for up to 2 hours, and the added convenience of the pause and pour feature makes serving a snap No need to wait for the entire carafe to brew – the Keurig K-Duo Plus Coffee maker can be paused mid-brew for 20 seconds, so you can pour fresh, hot coffee right away. Or set your preferred brew time up to 24 hours in advance and enjoy a freshly brewed carafe right when you want it with programmable carafe auto brew. The sleek design of the K-Duo Plus Coffee maker provides an eye-catching element of style and our first ever multi-position water reservoir can be situated on the left, right, or along the back of the brewer, ensuring the optimal configuration for your countertop. Create your perfect cup and carafe every time with the K-Duo Plus Coffee maker. Choose your favorite ground Coffee, or choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup Pod varieties of Coffee, tea, cocoa, and more. Use the strong brew button for a bolder, more intense single cup and carafe. With multiple brew sizes, You can make a 6, 8, 10, or 12-Cup carafe for large gatherings, as well as a 6, 8, 10, or 12 oz. Cup just for you. You can brew the perfect amount of fresh, full-flavored Coffee Whether you’re hosting friends or just enjoying a cup – and a moment – to yourself.
feature_bullets: What’s in the box: 12 cup thermal carafe and mesh reusable ground coffee filter included with your brewer
Brew a cup and a carafe: Use both ground coffee and k cup pods
Strong brew: Brew a stronger, more intense single cup and carafe
Multiple brew sizes: Brew a 6, 8, 10, or 12 cup carafe and a 6, 8, 10, or 12 ounces cup
Multi position 60 ounces; Water reservoir: Can be positioned to the right, left, or along the back of the brewer to optimize counter space
12 cup thermal carafe: Included with your brewer and keeps coffee warm for upto 2 hours
Programmable carafe auto-brew: Program your coffee maker to automatically brew a carafe upto 24 hours in advance.
Pause & pour: Automatically pauses your Coffee maker mid brew for 20 seconds, allowing the carafe to be poured
Smart start: Your Coffee maker heats, then brews in1 simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size.
